name: ecosystem
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
all the living things in an area and the way they affect each other and the environment: Pollution can have disastrous effects on the delicately balanced ecosystem. Marine biologists fear the predatory crabs have the potential to disrupt marine ecosystems. forest/reef/ocean ecosystems
any complicated system consisting of many different people, processes, activities, etc., especially relating to technology, and the way that they affect each other : A developer ecosystem is a community of software developers and the market that shares their tools and services. A new political ecosystem has grown up around local elections.
More examplesFewer examplesThe region's ecosystem is fragile and would suffer enormous damage if an oil tanker sank or leaked. They realized they would have to ban fishing in some areas in order to keep ecosystems healthy.Their research aims to assess how well Arctic ecosystems recover from human disturbance.To goal of the project is to deliver an open-source software ecosystem for universities.
